data.text: @DrAliSKhan Maybe conservatives are more attuned than liberals to assessing potential threats. And a needle is a potential threat..

@DrAliSKhan It seems to me that the money spent to send everyone in the USA a couple of N95 masks would have been far more effective if that money was spent on supplying Vaccination hubs with Needle free Injection technologies..
@DrAliSKhan Maybe conservatives are just more afraid things than democrats.. maybe that is why they all want to arm themselves with bear arms..

@DrAliSKhan I would absolutely bet that needle fear has caused all sorts of weird anti vaccination sentiment and engendered some extremely strange myths about vaccines as soon as mandatory vaccinations became a thing.. before that, needle phobic people probably simply never went to a doctor.
@DrAliSKhan It looks like up to 16% of adults could very well be avoiding all vaccines, blood work and oral care simply because of a fear of needles..

@DrAliSKhan https://t.co/UuX6oIqMIR we had them in boot camp.. every person would get an injection in both arms at the same time.. the guns could inject multiple vaccines all mixed together.. that was back in 1993

@DrAliSKhan Needle free injection technology (NFIT)is an extremely broad concept which include a wide range of drug delivery systems that drive drugs through the skin using any of the forces as Lorentz, Shock waves, pressure by gas or electrophoresis which propels the drug through the skin.
@PrairieWisdom @DrAliSKhan 2 out of 3 children have a phobia of needles..

@PrairieWisdom @DrAliSKhan Avoidance of (flu) vaccination because of needle fear occurred in 16% of adult patients, 27% of hospital employees, 18% of workers at long-term care facilities, and 8% of healthcare workers at hospitals.   https://t.co/wFyx1Wmlnd  needle free vaccine options need to be available
